## Post-Mortem Analysis
### Root Cause
What caused the failure? (check all that apply)
- [ ] Misunderstood requirements

### Failure Type
- [ ] Local Failure (syntax error, tool failure)
- [ ] Structural Failure (wrong approach, scaling issue)
